description.1: The base for large scale industrialization.

description.1: Any coal dust can be desulfurized to obtain high-quality coal dust, which can be shaped to obtain briquettes.
It can speed up small cogwheel turn at twice, which may be needed in some places.
Fuel can easily generate energy, but the general method of combustion is inefficient.
description.2: If the shape and chemical composition of the fuel can be changed to improve combustion efficiency, that would be a good thing.
description.3: However, the impurity within makes these fuels unsuitable for blasting fuels.

description.1: The vines wrapped in a ball, maybe you can dry them as a source of fire.
Collects the creosote produced of the charcoal pit.
description.2: &6Note: You may need to run charcoal pit a few more times to get enough oil for a barrel.
description.3: &6Place the creosote funnel below the charcoal pit that is about to run to collect the creosote produced by the charcoal pit.
description.4: The produced creosote will be stored in this creosote funnel, and the creosote can be taken out with containers such as barrels and ceramic buckets.

description.1: &6Use Pondering to view the structure of the bloomery
description.2: After setting up the bloomery, hold any Ore and press shift+right click and put it into the bloomery
description.3: Then hold ore or fuel right-click on the raw material block and put the rest material into the bloomery.
description.4: Ignite on the top raw material block to start the bloomery.
description.5: The &6&lbloomery needs blast from bellows during operation.
description.6: &6&lAfter the the process is completed, &bimmediately &6use a pickaxe to mine the blocks in it &bwhile it's still hot&r several times to get iron ingots

description.1: Mixed in food to enhance satiety.
Open your inventory to check your nutritional value
description.2: If your nutritional value is too low, the upper limit of your HP will be reduced.
description.3: A nutrient value exceeding 80%% will increase the upper limit of HP except sugar.
description.4: When the sugar value is high, it will cause hunger and Speed effect
description.5: High protein will increase your strength.

description.1: Provides good insulation effect

description.1: You took out a personal notebook and wrote your name after countless notes of your predecessors.
description.2: Set foot on this endless winter alone, your only purpose is "To Survive!".
description.3: "If there is hope, everything will get better."
description.4: &6Select Chapter 2 from the task list on the left to start playing.

description.2: It's unpalatable, but it can fill your stomach.

description.1: When did this winter start?

description.1: This is? Workbench!

description.1: &6&lThe steam input rate needs to be large enough to make it work. Try hand crank with large cogwheel on a pump.

description.1: Hay bales are very suitable for cultivating stress-resistant decomposers-fungi.
Looking around, there seems to be no gravel to be seen.
description.2: Why not look under the &b&l ice-covered riverbed
description.3: (Flint can be obtained by shapeless crafting of three gravels)
description.4: You can also dig snowy dirt to get flint by chance. Get stick by breaking leaves.
description.5: &6&lIf there are other quest descriptions that you haven't read, please be patient and read them one by one.

description.1: Water in your body is very important.
description.2: &6The thermos you found in your ship can be used to right-click on water source to fill water
description.3: &6But this is unpurified water, and you will be thirsty after drinking it.
description.4: In order to avoid the thirst effect, you need to drink purified water. The pure water stock you have at the beginning is enough for you to drink for a while
description.5: After you get the water filter or a campfire, you can purify or boil for the pure water.

33B6E7B60783C72B.title: Drinking

description.1: &6The necessary tool for crafting with flint workbench

description.1: &6&lPay attention to the proportion of items.
Fired to get quicklime
Hold any type of filter paper and right-click the water filter to install it.
description.2: The filter paper is durable. You can fill the top with a bucket, etc., and wait to receive pure water at the bottom.

description.1: You can restore body temperature and physical strength in the place where you settle down, and of course you can also barbecue.
description.2: If there are no other ignition tools,
description.3: Hold the flints with both hands and right click to try to ignite.
description.5: &6The bonfire will go out,

description.1: Generate in slate, white marble, and carbonaceous shale
Smart guy like you would try to build a nether portal with lava and ceramic bucket.
description.2: But it's too cold here! You cannot use such &5&lPyro Magic!&r
description.3: You probably needs &6&lAnother Way&r to get to the Dimension Beneath. But after all, you cannot find other ways with your current understanding of this world.
description.4: Before you got to that point, &c&lyou won't need any material from the Dimension Beneath&r

description.1: In this icy world, It's improtant to maintain a suitable body temperature.
description.2: When your body temperature get to a dangerous situation, you experience bar would become body temperature indicator, &c&land you would get harm after it become completly red&r.
description.3: You should find a &6&lShelter from wind and rain&r ASAP and &6&llight up a campfire&r to maintain body temperature.
description.4: Avoid drenched in snow or soaked in water, this make you become &b&lwet&r and easily lost body temperature.
description.5: Maybe you will need instruments to measure various temperatures later
description.7: &6&lPlanting plants probably needs a heating device!

description.1: A simple ignition device,

description.1: One of the main components of bronze.

description.3: Input steam can allow T2 Generator to operate at its optimum while boosting its heating range and temperature.

description.1: As the hatch opened, you saw a vast expanse of whiteness outside.
description.2: Recalling what the captain said to me before leaving: "This world is already at stake, you need to do your best to restore this world to normal."
description.3: "I have nothing to help you, I can only wish you good luck".
description.4: Returning from the memory, you walked out of the hatch, looked around: silence.
description.5: You realized that you can only rely on yourself now.

description.1: Redstone can be obtained by processing cinnabar

&6One Charcoal can only smelt one ore,
description.2: Perhaps the use of Coal will save a little bit more.

description.1: The Generator is the core of this modpack, a large multi-block structure used to heat the surrounding area. Ponder about the &b&lGenerator Core&r and check the multi-block structure.
description.2: You can also look at the structure here, ordering the blocks from top to bottom:
description.3: AAA ABA A A ABA A=Generator Brick
description.4: AAA BCB     B B B=Generator Amplifier
description.5: AAA ABA A A AAA C=Generator Core
description.6: After setting up the structure, click the side with an engineer's hammer.
description.7: This can be upgraded in the future.

description.1: An important tool, you can chop down trees faster now.

description.2: Among mica schist, rhyolite, komatiite, porphyry basalt, granite, diorite, pegmatite.

description.1: &lThe spacecraft that I piloted this time (no physical object yet) is one of the few space shuttles that can still operate normally on the space station.
description.3: You have to get the supplies as soon as possible.
description.4: Otherwise, in this hell-like weather, you will soon freeze to death!

description.1: &6Process clay to get clay buckets.
description.2: Contains various liquids, similar to a general fluid unit.

description.1: A hardy vegetable that can grow at very low temperatures.
Anything seems to be found in the river bed
description.2: If you want clay, go to the river to dig it.
description.3: It makes sense, isn't it?

description.1: Find all Immersive Engineering-related Multiblock structures inside!

description.1: Generated in the river bed. Dig to get copper ore.
It might be REALLY cold if you don't wear clothes.
Made with stone slab. Can store a little stuff.
Right-click and use the flint process knife to process the leather.
Its heat resistance is better than sand bricks, and you can use it to make blast furnace bricks.

description.1: You spent 4 days warming up two fungus beds, and now you can finally enjoy the results.
Consists mostly of calcium carbonate.
These beasts have extremely sharp teeth
description.2: It mostly travels alone
description.3: Yet approaching one of them is not a wise choice

description.1: Acquire hardware
description.2: &6Most of the Magnetite spawns in the upper sedimentary rock,
description.3: &6Pyrite spawns in the under magmatic rock
description.5: &6Make the crafting table after getting iron

description.1: The world is perilous, and some untamed creatures are wild.
description.2: Can be projected as a spear.

description.1: Consuming water and burning every burnable to produce steam.
description.2: Better take a look at the Fuel Treatment chapter in the quest book.
description.3: The &6&l boiler must be placed on top of the burning chamber

description.1: Cheap and efficient fuel.
description.2: Construction method:
description.3: &6Pile the logs and &b&l seal them&r&6 in a closed space,
description.4: &6Leave a hole for ignition, and immediately cover it.
description.5: Wait until the firing is complete to get charcoal.

76B2B1A3EC6D92CD.subtitle: Primitive fuel, but also filters water
76B2B1A3EC6D92CD.title: Charcoal Pit

description.1: As long as the shape of the wood is changed, it can burn more fully.
For ordinary charcoal pits, dirt is sufficient.
description.2: But if you want to produce coke coal, you need to build a charcoal pit with &b&lstone bricks
description.3: To produce coke coal, you must have a &6&l coal pile, not a log pile

description.1: Right-click to open the gui and add items.
description.2: &b&lShift-empty-handed-right-click&r it to grind.
description.4: Now with this invention, you can do some useful fuel processing to increase its burn time!
description.5: See more in&6&l Fuel Processing&r chapter

description.1: Provides broader geological information in a smaller area.
description.2: &6Including info about stone layer and ore info at the bottom
description.3: &eCopper prospecting shovel has limited detecting depth. You might need some special techniques to find deeper ores...

description.1: A multifunctional pot that integrates frying, braising, and stewing.
description.2: The usage is very simple. Just throw in the food with any ingredient value description and cook and it's done. As for what it comes out...

7AA152F9B5AF6677.subtitle: In the cold winter, let's stew a pot of hot dishes.

description.1: &lTeamMoeg-TWRDev is the core development team of this modpack.
Got a surplus in creosote? Try our latest oil burner.
description.2: Simply placing it on top of a coke oven consumes all creosote produced, while producing smoke for decoration(?)
description.3: You can also pump more fluid into it to burn it faster, but do not attempt to heat anything

description.1: It consumes less stress than bronze cogwheels.
